{
    "sql": "ALTER TABLE `workbenchtest`.`table2` DROP COLUMN `table2col`; ALTER TABLE `workbenchtest`.`table2` ADD COLUMN `table2col` INT NULL;",
    "Affected Elements": "ALTER TABLE, DROP COLUMN, ADD COLUMN",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The SQL generated by the MySQL Workbench incorrectly attempts to change a column without properly dropping the existing column first, leading to an unknown column error."
}
